item.title: Avalanche Energy hits key milestone on the road to a desktop fusion reactor
item.description: Seattle-based Avalanche recently operated its desktop fusion machine for hours on end while maintaining 300,000 volts.

item.title: How TRIC Robotics is reducing pesticide use on strawberries using UV light
item.description: TRIC Robotics just raised a $5.5 million seed round for its tractor-sized robots that help eliminate bacteria and pests on strawberry plants.

item.title: Eight months in, Swedish unicorn Lovable crosses the $100M ARR milestone
